Body:
"""Test our elliptical gaussian creation function"""
x, y = np.indices((3, 3))
gauss = fitting.elliptical_gaussian(x, y, amp=1, xo=0, yo=1, sx=1, sy=1,
    theta=0)
if np.any(np.isnan(gauss)):
    raise AssertionError()
gauss = fitting.elliptical_gaussian(x, y, amp=1, xo=0, yo=1, sx=1, sy=1,
    theta=np.inf)
if not np.all(np.isnan(gauss)):
    raise AssertionError()
